caption: Great
Very great service very friendly food is so great..is a 5 star place
I had the baked rigatoni. Delicious Was my first time there. I went again and had the Lasagna. I knew better nobody could ever make it better than Mom.

The restaurant was originally located at the corner of Sunset and Alvarado. I've been coming here for over thirty years. It's a wonderful family owned business with some of the best Italian food in Los Angeles. The homemade marinara sauce is to die for. Don't miss out if your in the area.
Good food. Better than Olive Garden, quick service.
Delicious, classic Italian food from one of Echo Park's oldest restaurants. One of my faves in the city, a must try!
best margherita pizza is the best thing I have ever had. The best.
Great selection of drinks, beer on draft and other food, but I was there for the pizza.  Staff was nice and friendly.
Great Pizza
Great tasting pizza! Has always been one of LA's best.
Tasty food, good value for money, and always consistent quality.
Delicious
Best pizza in town and Awesome food.
I order from this place almost every weekend. Tasty food, good value for money, and always consistent quality. This is a place that does simple wholesome food really really well.
Stopped by to have one of my favorite pizzas. This is still one of the best pizzas around this area. Great atmosphere and excellent customer service.
AMAZING  STEAK  SANDWICH
Best pizza in LA
Worst pizza I've had...ever! Bread sticks were ok. If you like this style of pizza, go to Little Caesar's it's cheaper and better.

Delicious pizza made with care and high quality ingredients. Although I'm nostalgic for when they were located at their original spot at the corner of Sunset and Alvarado, I'm delighted they are still in the neighborhood.
One of my fav places for tasty italian food. The service here is outstanding. The place has a nice feel to it.
Italian food, delicious.

The pizza here is excellent. Really good fluffy, yet crispy, bottomed crust! They are not lying when they say the don’t skimp on toppings! There was definitely two layers of pepperoni on the pepperoni deluxe. We added mushrooms and black olives and they were really nicely blended in so you could tell the pie was made to order.
This place is insanely amazing!! The pizza melted in my mouth like butter!! The pizza was so good!! Wow!!
Italian food... super good. Will surely make a return trip. They have so many good reviews for a reason.
Favorite pizza place near DTLA.Order online and pick up is quick.
Great pizza!!!
The garlic bread is amazing. I've never liked deep dish pizza in general, but the crust at little star is really grainy and delicious. So much better than classic Chicago deep dish.
The wait is long, but the pizza is fantastic. Thick, thin, doesn't matter.
The crust is AMAZING.  never been a deep dish guy but little star has converted me.  However, my favorite pie is the white pie.  simple toppings done right.  Cant beat it!

The thin crust classic pizza with pepperoni.  BOOM!  The crust is cornmeal crusted :)  The cheese oozes when you lift up a piece, and the toppings cover all corners.  Every single bite is yummmmy in my tummy!

My first taste of their Supreme pizza (sausage, peppers) and it was love at first taste. It was perfectly topped with what tasted like authenticly seasoned Italian sausage, and Fresh veggies. Usually I throw away the crust, but i couldnt do that to Little Star's. I'm looking forward to trying their deep crust pizza for my next visit.

This place is so cozy, and its location is great. I love their deep dish pizza, the classic one but you can not go wrong with any one of them! The chicken pesto thin crust pizza is great too. Their garlic bread is really good.

Pizza heaven.  We tried a small deep dish with half Little Star and half Mediterranean Chicken.  I can't decide which side I liked better because they were both phenomenal.  It costs $1 extra for two kinds on one pizza and be prepared to …

What else can really be said!? This is some of the best deep dish I've ever had. I highly recommend going with more than you think you're going to eat. It might be even better reheated a few days later! Mmmmmm

great pizza and good service.  now THATS hard to find these days.  parking a bit tuff but not impossible.  a nice assortment of salads.  we had beers but the wine list was pretty good too!  a pleasant dining experience with friends.

It is pizza but AMAZING!!  Server is amazing attentive but not annoying.  Good selection of tap and bottle beer.  The appetizer salad is good for two people. We have had the thin crust each time and it is great each time!!  This time we …

First time eating here, had a great time! The vibe was wonderful, waiters were super kind, and attentive. The pizza, wings, mozzarella sticks were delicious, I'd definitely come back to this place! This place is a great place to be on a Saturday night with friends, family, or your partner! Definitely recommend :)

I've been looking for a solid tomato sauce for quite some time in California. And being a Chicago style pizza fan I can unapologetically recommend Little Star Pizza.  If you are on the hunt for some good zesty, chunky, crunchy deep dish …

Love love LOVEEE this place. Back in high school during school events that catered food, they would get us Dipillas. Fast forward 7 years later, they never fail to satisfy my cravings. I honestly only come for 2 things, their complimentary bread and the infamous bowtie pasta.
This place is always so good! I'm addicted to their squid ink risotto  we tried the meatballs too and they're amazing. Never had anything but great food at this place.

This pizza spot is without a doubt one of the best pizzerias that I've been to. I had the half Margarita and half Yellow Squash pizza. The ingredients are fresh and very tasty. Any time I'm in SF, I'll be sure to stop by this place.

Thank goodness for Little Star. The Shelter in Place needed a dose of nostalgia, so I picked up a large deep-dish pizza for a party of one on a recent Sunday afternoon. Half orders are possible, so I split it between chicken-spinach and …
The thin crust pesto pizza was SO GOOD. That crust was so crunchy and thin. It kept its shape instead of folding in on itself. The pesto was so fresh!
Fantastic pizza and service!!
Everything I had there was really satisfying. And the service was good even when they were slammed.

The pizza I ordered came with garlic and boyyyy did it! There was raw/uncooked pieces of garlic about the size of the eraser on the end of a pencil all over the pizza, between the cheese and the crust. The entire thing was inedible and the restaurant refused to give me a refund.
Delicious!
Good 🍕, 🍤 linguini pasta n sanwiches

HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED in my margarita pizza, italians themselves would be disappointed. The pizza isn’t properly sliced, I had to cut it myself. The cheese slides right off when I pick it up, so I have to pick up the cheese and place it on my pizza. Never again.
Great place to eat in Echo Park!
very best
Awesome drinks awesome food i was kinda up set that they no longer serve coffee  still a great atmosphere .
Yes yes yes! So glad I came here with my tired friend who had been moving from South Bay to CA the whole day as we finally sat down at 9:00pm for a late dinner.

Hands down the best pizza I've had since I moved from New York 11 years ago, even after they were forced out of the original location. The staff is wonderful and the pasta and sandwiches are awesome as well. Keanu Reeves approved :) Highly recommended
My new favorite spot for pizzas! I feel so thankful that I came upon this restaurant on yelp. I was so very excited that they offered pizza options with my favorite burata cheese.

I don’t normally like to leave negative reviews but there wasn’t anything positive about my first experience with Pizza Buona. I ordered the house special online and arrived about 10 minutes before the scheduled pick-up time. Given that, i …
I'm not a coffee drinker but I would say Pizza Buona has some fantastic drinks.  The decor looks very cozy and you can tell it's probably the hip cafe to be at in the sunset.
We left full, happy, and feeling good about supporting locally owned business! I’ll be coming back and bringing friends... I hear your delivery is great too. Pizza Buona, you’re the real deal!
Edgar was  excellent. Delicious food.
Best pizza in town!

I usually get a take out order of their pasta and pizza - AMAZING! For my family I will order their fresh pasta (made in house) with the bolognese sauce and a whole sheet of the cicciona pizza! The crust is thicker, but light and crispy - you honestly have to try it and your mind will be blown.
Yes yes yes! So glad I came here with my tired friend who had been moving from South Bay to SF the whole day as we finally sat down at 9:00pm for a late dinner.
They have the most amazing pizza I've ever had in Los Angeles in the 30 years I've lived here.

A bit out of the way, I hoped the trek would be worth it. Spent the whole day running around the city trying to get things done and had a caravan of people ready to stop and eat an hour ago. Finally made it here and let the crew at the …

(Translated by Google) It is not in the location that marks Google and does not respect the schedule. I could not eat there.  (Original) No está en la ubicación que marca google y no respetan el horario. No pude comer ahi.
Love love love this place.  Best pizza ever
Great for average over priced pizza. Totally surprised about the great reviews. I guess Californians don't know good pizza.

Pizza Buona dishes, risotto was probably one of the best I've had. Service was on point, we had a group of six in my party. Luckily some of my friends got there early, had to wait an hour on a Monday night but nbd. I believe this is the norm for Los Angeles.
We ordered this pizza thinking it would be great based on the reviews but when it arrived it was cold and the cheese was hardened :( We waited an hour and 15 mins for that and were very disappointed.
Food is delicious and fresh, service is great and the  waiter Edgar awesome attitude.
One of the best pizzas I have rated in LA and the decor is rocking as well full bar and good to go !!

I take my family to this great spot many times a year! This is my favorite restaurant to to have a good dinner.  I visit this spot many times. The meals are very good, the staff members are helpful and the prices are fair. I enjoy meeting in this place over a good supper.
Awesome pie!
Yummy pizza at very affordable prices. Great service and clean environment.
Original pizza of Echo Park,  awesome pizza !🍕
It was a great find. The pizza was excellent, and the staff was friendly and prompt.
Excellent pizza, great atmosphere, awesome service. We had the giant works pizza and was more than enough to feed our family of 4.
I love this place! Been a customer since i was 10 and they where on Sunset and Alvarado. The specialty pizza is my favorite!🤤🤤

I was so excited to see that Pizza Buona was still open or should I say re opened a block down and across the street from the original location. The location might have changed but the menu and the level of quality hasn't. The food is …

Simply put...one of the best pizzas I have ever had in my life, and I know my pizzas. The dough is so good, toppings all fresh and definitely has a authentic Italian taste. I feel confidently say this is the best pizza in this area hands down! If you are a pizza fan like me head over like right now NOW and try it for your self!

This is the closest i came to really feeling like I was in Italy since I was in Italy. The food is inexpensive, ingredients fresh and organic, recipes simple and tasty and service is personal. I get fed up with dealing with 4-5 different people in one sitting.
Love the food fast delivery customer service is great mmmm delicious
I first tried their pizza over 30 years ago when they were still Pizza Bozza.  I've never found any joint that makes a better pizza in LA.  Ever.
Great service! Good food. Loved it.
Very special, authentic place. Large, tasty meals which are good even the day after
My favorite pizza place for the past 25yrs!

This is another one of my "go tos" when I have people visiting or want to take people out for a reliably good meal.  The food is great, service is on point, and the cocktails are very drinkable.  Make a reservation and enjoy.  I have never had a bad experience.
Great pizza, great pasta, and priced just right.  We will be back.  Fed 3 for under $60 and we have half a pizza for lunch the next day.
They have pizza ready and lightly heat them once you order. Overall the pizza was soft, crunchy and filled with flavor.
All the staff were extremely kind and the food was amazing! There was a calm vibe to the area, with cute photos posted up about the restaurant's history. Service at Pizza Buona was excellent !!
The best pizza in town
Great food and service

Friendly staff family owned I have been eating at bouno pizzas since the 80s when it was called bozza pizza love their sandwiches and garlic bread pizza is hand tossed fresh ingredients.highly recommend.

Nice family run business, run with consistency. Better than your Domino, Shakey franchised type pizza. Pastas and Salads are good to. Not cheap, but usually I get two or three meals out of a delivery.

Absolutely delicious favorites. The pizza is made to perfection. Enjoy a creamy pasta alfredo or a freshly prepared antipasto. You will not be disappointed. This is a local gem with worldly favor. Hope you enjoy. And dont forget to grab a pizza to go.
Great place to eat

Took tooo f —- long to arrive Why? You guys are pretty empty not like it is to be when it was pizza Pozza trying to give the neighborhood the business and not the chain pizzas so get your act together or you are going to be close down    And work on your crust guys please.   Living here over 72 years
The cheese is fantastic
food is delicious especially the pizza
Old School excellence!

First... don’t be fooled by going to the pizza place just down the block on the corner with the similar name... (seriously don’t). It’s easy to make the mistake, so letting you know now: just make sure you come to PIZZA BUONA. This is the …
Food was amazing. From the salad to the meatball and the pizza. The place is a bit small. But clean an appears recently renovated. Services was also great.

This place was awesome for a mom and pop pizza place. There were 2 other pizza places literally down the street from each other and they are nothing in comparison to what Pizza Buona is! I would recommend this place Everytime
My preferred spot for delicious italian food. Definitely one of the best places in the area. Service is typically above par. The place has a nice atmosphere.
Pizza was the bomb. Taste was amazing, one of the best pizzas I had in a while..
They have pizza ready and lightly heat them once you order. Overall the pizza was soft, crunchy and filled with flavor.
Pizza Buona Pizza never dissappoints! Slices are huge and the flavors are great!

I like their pizza, the antipasto salad, and the lasagna is so good, for a person that doesn't like lasagna, I like this one, also is very close to my place.

(Translated by Google) Tremendous pizzas at a good price. The place is small only 4 tables, it is best to buy to take. The people who attend very kind.  (Original) Tremendas pizzas a buen precio. El lugar es chico solo 4 mesas, lo mejor es comprar para llevar. La gente que atiende muy amable.
Best pizza in LA, hands down. Order the Pizza Rustica. If you don't love it, I'll pay for it.
Love it its a never miss
The food continues being delicious as it has always been and customer service is great.
Awesome is all you need to know, family business that caters to you order pizza on the side of your main dish and you'll be rocking 👍👍👍👍👍🙏
I've been coming here for 20 years, they moved to this location about 6 or 7 years ago. Such a great family, amazing comfort food.
Great pizza, great pasta, and priced just right.  We will be back.  Fed 3 for under $60 and we have half a pizza for lunch the next day.
Beyond bomb food. Cant get enough of their pizza and pasta. Definitely worth the prices and the staff is awesome.
Deep Dish The Best pizza every!!!! stuffed with mushroom & spinach , plum tomatoes 3 cheese blend and garlicy crust! Best pizza hands down!!!!

(Translated by Google) Good flavor and a lot of tradition, only the place is very small, I think there are only 3 tables  (Original) Buen sabor y mucha tradición solo que es muy pequeño el lugar ,creo solo son 3 mesas
Pizza and Shrimp Fettuccine was awesome! It's been almost a week later and I'm still thinking about how good their food was! Can't go to LA now without going to this place.
Bombay is a great one of my favorite pizza places in downtown and their staff is kind and courteous a great place to eat but a 4 star rating because it's not the best pizza and kinda pricey.
My favorite place to eat!! The best 🍕🍝

Once again we were duped by the LA public. Ordered from this place because they got 4.6 stars on Google. Figured we'd give it a shot because we needed to feed a few kids. Ordered a large cheese pizza and 2 chicken parmagianas with …

Hands down the best pizza in LA. Real Chicago style pizza. I haven't found any pizza close to the pizza from home til I discovered Pizza Buona. This place is the real Deal! Very small dine in area. I suggest carry out. Somewhat pricey but worth it.
I absolutely Love this Place . Food is really good and the server is so nice . I strongly recommend this place .
Great pizza and sandwiches!

Must eat the pizza hot. I've taken the pizza to go and it has a tendency of getting cold quickly and being that the pizza is very thick it's best to eat it piping hot. My favorite is the pepperoni pizza. However if you like garlic and clams …
Always great, never disappoint.

The service was amazing, the server was polite and friendly and  she was super quick in bringing our order. We had the pastrami sandwich and  lasagna. You gotta try the pastrami sandwich, it's amazing. the lasagna was great too but I just love pastrami so I say you gotta try the pastrami sandwich.  Sitting is limited.
Great people, amazing food, a diamond in the rough.
Great pizza
I dont know the ladies name but she was probably the owner? She was very nice.
Been eating here for 20 years best pizza in LA!
They have a lot of variety, but mine is the pasta and the salad that they give delicious
This Is the OG pizza buona! Dont be fooled by the gentrified cosa Buona that had no shame in keeping part of their name! Keep supporting the actual pillars of the community such as pizza buona!
45 YRS LATER STILL GREAT FOOD THANKS

FOR ME THIS IS MOTHER PIZZA I have been EATING here since 65 HANDS DOWN ECHO PARK'S PIZZA
Quality food and service. Delicious!
Very delicious food and great service 👍 Ordered Chicken deluxe pizza and House salad with Italian dressing.. It was very good. Recommend this place 👌
Nice owner, good pizza. The tables should be smaller for that dining room size. It's hard to maneuver around.

I really wanted to give 5 stars here, and it was close. I ordered through Grubhub, and the delivery arrived 10 minutes early which was nice. They also followed the delivery instructions thoroughly. The wings are DELICIOUS. Wow. Some of the …

The cheese pizza is like a taste of my childhood, growing up in upstate New York. The grandmothers in the kitchen would only speak Italian while making delicious pizza. Pizza Buona has a hearty, not sweet sauce. A generous helping of their …
Love this place ..

A really lovely Italian restaurant.  The people who run the place are extremely friendly.  Location is small, so be aware this would not be the best place to take a large party of people.  But for takeout or small groups, this is lovely!  I …
Everything here is good,  real italian recipes,  fresh salads, love this place

The food here is great: fresh, hot, and tasty, they even make their own dough. Staff is very friendly and courteous here.  The main drawback is the place is small but you can order for pick up.  They are not cheap but then again they're not …
The atmosphere is definitely something special. The pizza was pretty good too.
Good authentic pizza!
Great lo pizza.  My new favorite spot!
They moved locations but the pizza is still awesome! Not to be confused with Cosa Buono which is now in the location Pizza Buona used to be in.
Great place! Pizza amazing and cold sandwiches the best
One of the best pizza places I have ever been. Not only was the food great but so was the service! It was also a very clean restaurant too!
Excellent experience...food was delicious, service was exceptional. I rated 4 stars however due to no high chairs for kids and no bathrooms.

I was a long time costumer, almost 40 years, but now that I'm healing on a wheelchair with a speech impediment, I realised how rude and impatient they've been on the phone. They got my last two orders wrong and charged me for it (more $).  Their average food is not worth the bad service. I will no longer be a customer.
Originals!

I brought every single girl I dated here and if they didn't like  it..oh well, there's plenty of more fish in the sea.  I've had the pizza, spaghetti & meatballs, salad w/Italian dressing, and garlic bread.  All are top line.

Excellent!!!! Best pizza in town!!!

Truly authenically superb. No comparison in the area. Pick from the menu with your eyes closed. You will delightfully pleased. Yummmm.

Truely is the best tasting pizza. Must try it and see

On vacation in LA, staying in Echo Park.   Awesome pizza!!! :)

Ummm um mmmmm!!! So good!! Ive been eating here for over 10 years.  (Great hearty lunch specials.) So beyond the sentimental value the food is Excellent . High quality ingredients ALWAYS fresh, good hand tossed crust, AND THE TIRAMISU is …

Always loved this place since we moved here 7 years ago. The food is great, the team is awesome and friendly. So glad that they reopened so close to us. We especially love the specialty pies. Yesterday we had a submarine sandwich (their version of an Italian sub) for the firat time and it was awesome!
Best pizza out there.
Real pizza buona. New place on Sunset and Alvarado are name taking a holes.
This place is great.

best lasagna ever, had some last night. It was great..... cant wait for summer to take pizza down to the lake and eat the original echo park pizza with a beer.
I love this place and so happy they reopened.  The bow tie pasta with Chicken is the best!
Delicious Salami Pizza and Chicken Parm. sandwich! Staff is also very friendly.

This is probably the best classic pizza I've had in LA. Coming from New York, I've found its hard to find really good pizza. This totally huts the spot.

My favorite pizza shop in the city so far. But not only pizza, I've tried their lasagna, spaghetti, and calzones. All were delicious. They also have a beer selection better than most pizza joints. Come to this place, you will not be disappointed.

We stayed nearby and every night we came home from our daily tourist trips we saw a lot of people in there so we expected it to be a very good local place to eat.  It was not.. We ordered lasagna and a house special pizza and the amount of …

Service is good, friendly. For me the pizza was well, too cheesy. I know you say - how is this even possible!?!? And, I hear you. There was too much cheese on the pizza and lasagna that - the flavors were lost. Such a bummer.  Good value - heavy handed.
Great and healthy food with soup/salad and garlic bread for a good price. My best dinner in LA.
Love this delicious pl, been coming since 1993..!!
great pizza !

This place is great for all the previously reasons stated, but what I want to know is when is it going to be reopened? For reals this time.
